categories: Category:The Old Republic: Blood of the Empire

nodes.text: The Old Republic 6: Blood of the Empire, Part 3

The Old Republic 6: Blood of the Empire, Part 3 is the sixth issue in the Star Wars: The Old Republic comic series and is a re-release of the webcomic The Old Republic, Blood of the Empire Act 3: Burn the Future. Blood of the Empire, Part 3 was released by Dark Horse Comics on December 2, 2010, and collected with the other two parts of the arc in Star Wars: The Old Republic Volume 1: Blood of the Empire.

Teneb Kel is only steps behind his prey, the emperor's apprentice, when light is finally shed on her dark plans. The foundling Sith Lord must find and face her one last time to uncover the secret behind her betrayal . . .
